column4: Is there anything for ubuntu and intell drivers like envyng-qt for nvidia and radeon
its not detecting them becuase it wont detect my monitor so I cant change the resolution
but if you want to be sure, check and see if the package "xserver-xorg-video-intel" package is installed
couldnt find anypackages under sudo aptitude install xserver-xorg-video-intel
what does 'apt-cache search xorg intel' show you?
Which packages do you see available?  If its a lot, post them in pastebin.ubuntu.com or something
the 2nd one on the list, xserver-xorg-video-intel is what you want to make sure is installed
do you know what intel chipset you have?  "lspci" might be able to tell you this
that doesnt show it, but sticker says atom
I'm not sure if this will work, but you can try.  do "sudo gedit /etc/modules" and add "i915" on an empty line at the end of that file.  You'll have to restart after that
ill try that the file was empty but lp in it
